title: Recycling of e-waste power cables using microwave-induced pyrolysis – process characteristics and facile recovery of copper metal
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29955-29964
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05602G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Satoshi Horikoshi, Naoki Hachisuga, Nick Serpone
Recycling e-wastes using a VVF power cable through a rapid pyrolytic mechanism by microwave radiation is reported, and it is possible to produce copper wire and carbon resources without going through highly toxic intermediates.
